initial.subject: I built Joe's Plumbing a demo site (your mobile site might be turning away customers)
initial.body:
# Initial Outreach Email

**Subject:** I built {{business_name}} a demo site (your mobile site might be turning away customers)

---

Hi Joe,

I was checking out Joe's Plumbing's website and noticed something that might be costing you customers.

Your site doesn't look great on phones â€” and with 60% of local searches happening on mobile, that's likely costing you leads.

Instead of just pointing this out, I went ahead and built you a quick demo showing what your site could look like with these issues fixed:

**ðŸ‘‰ https://demo.example.com/joe-s-plumbing**

No sales pitch, no obligation â€” I just thought you'd want to see it.

If you like what you see and want to chat about making it live, I'm happy to hop on a quick call. If not, no worries at all â€” consider it a free gift.

Cheers,
Marb

P.S. I noticed you have 47 reviews on Google â€” that's solid social proof that'll look great on the new site.

followup1.subject: Quick follow-up on that Joe's Plumbing demo
followup1.body:
# Follow-up Email #1 (Day 3)

**Subject:** Quick follow-up on that Joe's Plumbing demo

---

Hi Joe,

Just wanted to make sure my last email didn't get lost in the shuffle.

I put together a demo site for Joe's Plumbing that addresses the mobile experience issues:

I know you're busy running a business, so I'll keep this short â€” the demo is there whenever you have 2 minutes to look.

Happy to answer any questions if you have them.

followup2.subject: Last thing about Joe's Plumbing's website
followup2.body:
# Follow-up Email #2 (Day 7)

**Subject:** Last thing about Joe's Plumbing's website

---

Hi Joe,

I'll keep this super quick.

I built a demo for Joe's Plumbing about a week ago (here's the link again: https://demo.example.com/joe-s-plumbing).

If the timing isn't right, I totally get it. But if you've been meaning to look and just haven't had a chance, here's what stood out:

â€¢ Mobile-optimized layout that works on any device
â€¢ Lightning-fast load times (under 2 seconds)
â€¢ Secure HTTPS connection (no scary browser warnings)

Either way, I won't keep bugging you. Just wanted to make sure you had the chance to see what's possible.

Best,
Marb

breakup.subject: Should I close your file?
breakup.body:
# Breakup Email (Day 14)

**Subject:** Should I close your file?

---

Hi Joe,

I've reached out a few times about the demo site I built for Joe's Plumbing, but haven't heard back.

No hard feelings at all â€” I know website stuff isn't always the top priority when you're running a business.

I'm going to close out your file, but the demo will stay live for another 30 days if you ever want to check it out:

**https://demo.example.com/joe-s-plumbing**

If things change or you want to revisit this down the road, just reply to this email. I'll be around.

Wishing you and Joe's Plumbing all the best,
Marb
